name: SuperSecret
description:
SuperSecret is a tiny 3rd-person adventure where you run around, meet a couple of weirdos, and solve a puzzle. Oh! You also do cool stuff. You like cool stuff, don't you? I think maybe you like cool stuff.
  • Explore a surreal setting!
  • Use your phenomenal powers to amaze weirdos!
  • Collect Magical Mystery Musical notes!
  • Solve the SuperSecret!
  • Take a One-Hour Vacation from a terrible horrible world!
Bon Voyage!
